name: Skull Pendant Light - Black
description: Skull pendant globe light with braided fabric cord. The skull measures 16cm x 15cm x 20cm HxWxL (6.25"x 6"x 8") and is cast in two layers of resin, a black external layer and a white internal layer. Each light is fitted with 1 meter of braided fabric cord in a selection of colours. Custom cord lengths are available, Please contact us for details. Fitted with E14 SES or E12 Candelabra bulb fittings depending on buyers location, appropriate light fittings will be fitted for the destination country unless otherwise requested. ____________________________ Each piece is individually hand made in our Birmingham, UK studio and is made to order Usually ships in 3-4 weeks. Our lead times vary, please take a moment to read our Terms & Conditions before placing an order

name: Faceted Wall Clock - Turquoise
description: Geometry inspired faceted wall clock, individually hand cast in resin Each Faceted Wall Clock is formed in a flexible tessellated mould, the facets of the mould are manipulated by hand for each piece which gives every clock a unique shape, so no two are quite the same As the light changes throughout the day, the tones of the facets alter, and the clock's shape appears to transform ____________________________ Fitted with a high quality, virtually silent, German made UTS movement, requires 1 x AA battery (included) Colour: Turquoise Available with a Gold, Silver or Black hands Diameter: 30cm (12") Weight: approx 800g ____________________________ Each clock is individually hand made in our Birmingham, UK studio and is made to order Usually ships in 3-4 weeks. Our lead times vary, please take a moment to read our Terms & Conditions before placing an order Ships in custom made, foam lined box to ensure safe delivery Custom clock colours available on request

name: Festoon Ceiling Light Set
description:
Vintage style festoon ceiling lights with braided fabric cord - Set of three

These festoon ceiling lights suit many different décor styles and can be hung in many different ways to achieve a variety of lighting effects.

Each set of lights consists of three glazed ceramic lamp holders with 0.5 meters of braided fabric cord between each light and come with white hooks for hanging.

Custom cord lengths and configurations are available, Please email us for details.

Uses E26/E27 screw cap bulbs (Bulbs not included)

Each light is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: Diamond Hanging Planter - Pair
description:
Hand cast resin and leather hanging planters

This pair of hanging planters are individually cast in a natural white resin and hang from real leather cord.

Each planter measures 5" in diameter x 4.5" high and hangs a total of 13" from top of leather cord to bottom of planter.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: PolyGlobe Pendant Light - Large
description: Polyglobes are individually formed in a modular geometric mould which is constructed to form each piece. Cast in a natural white resin the Polyglobe's defined lines and facets create a modern geometric aesthetic The simplistic and minimal design with a finely hand crafted finish makes for a stylish and impacting lighting piece, available with a variety of cord colour options, the Polyglobe complements almost any décor style ____________________________ Dimensions: Diameter 35cm/14in x Height 25cm/10in Cord length: 200cm/6.5ft Bulb type: E27 ES Max.60W - UK, Europe, Australia etc (not included) E26 ES Max.60W - USA, Canada, Japan (not included) Weight: approx 3kg ____________________________ Each piece is individually hand made in our Birmingham, UK studio and is made to order Usually ships in 3-4 weeks. Our lead times vary, please take a moment to read our Terms & Conditions before placing an order

name: PolyGlobe Wall Clock - Mauve
description:
These PolyGlobe wall clocks are individually cast in a mauve coloured resin and are formed in a polyhedra mould, the hands of the clock wrap around the globe to create an amazing 3 dimensional appearance.

Available in two diameter sizes, standard 7" (12.5cm) and large 10" (25cm) both with a choice of Gold, Black or Silver hands. Fitted with quality sweeping (non ticking) Quartz movement, requires 1 x AA battery.

Each clock is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Made to order, ships 2-3 weeks.

Custom clock colours are available on request.

name: PolyGlobe Wall Clock - Mustard
description:
These PolyGlobe wall clocks are individually cast in a mustard colour resin and are formed in a polyhedra mould, the hands of the clock wrap around the globe to create an amazing 3 dimensional appearance.

Available in two diameter sizes, standard 7" (12.5cm) and large 10" (25cm) both with a choice of Gold, Black or Silver hands. Fitted with quality sweeping (non ticking) Quartz movement, requires 1 x AA battery.

Each clock is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Made to order, ships 2-3 weeks.

Custom clock colours are available on request.

name: Faceted Globe Pendant Light
description: Faceted globes are individually formed in a modular geometric mould which is constructed to form each piece, the facets of the mould are manipulated by hand to create a unique shape, so no two are quite the same This unique production process gives the globes their defined lines and facets which ultimately makes for a stylish and impacting lighting piece ____________________________ Dimensions: Diameter 14cm/5.5in x Height 12.cm/4.75in Cord length: 200cm/6.5ft Bulb type: E14 ES Max.40W - UK, Europe, Australia etc (not included) E12 ES Max.40W - USA, Canada, Japan (not included) Weight: approx 600g ____________________________ Each piece is individually hand made in our Birmingham, UK studio and is made to order Usually ships in 3-4 weeks. Our lead times vary, please take a moment to read our Terms & Conditions before placing an order

name: Twisted Prism Vase
description:
These vases consists of two layers of resin, a natural off-white exterior colour and a turquoise interior colour which are poured into a handmade polyhedra mould to form it's sharp lines and striking appearance.

The vase measures 7" in height and approx 3.5-4" in diameter.

Each one is individually cast in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Other colours are available as well as custom colours by request.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: Diamond Hanging Planter
description:
Hand cast resin and leather hanging planter.

These hanging planters are individually cast in a natural white resin and hang from real leather cord.

Planter measures 5" in diameter x 4.5" high and hangs a total of 13" from top of leather cord to bottom of planter.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: PolyGlobe Wall Clock - White
description:
These PolyGlobe wall clocks are individually cast in a natural white resin and are formed in a polyhedra mould, the hands of the clock wrap around the globe to create an amazing 3 dimensional appearance.

Available in two diameter sizes, standard 7" (12.5cm) and large 10" (25cm) both with a choice of Gold, Black or Silver hands. Fitted with quality sweeping (non ticking) Quartz movement, requires 1 x AA battery.

Each clock is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Made to order, ships 2-3 weeks.

Custom clock colours are available on request.

name: Branching Globe Chandelier
description:
The branching globe chandelier is built from a mixture of cast resin, leather and internal wire frame structure, and is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Each globe measures approx 5" and is cast in a natural off white resin, these are formed individually in a polyhedra shaped mould that is manipulated by hand to give each one it's unique shape. The globes are fixed to a galvanised steel wire frame which is wrapped in pearl white real leather cord.

The light's frame can be repositioned a small amount when first hanging to alter the lighting effect and overall appearance.

It measure approx 20" in height and 20" in width at it's widest point. Cord length is 10' (3 metres) from leather portion of light. The light is fitted with E14 SES or E12 Candelabra light fittings depending on buyers location, appropriate light fittings will be fitted for destination country unless otherwise requested.

Alternative leather colours are available for a small upcharge, please select the colour of your choice when ordering.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: Cubic - Pot/Vase
description:
Each one of these pots is cast in 2 layers of resin that is poured into a cubic polyhedra shaped mould. Each mould is made using a mixture of origami and geometry that is manipulated by hand for each piece to give each one a unique shape and organic feel.

The pot measures 5" x 5" width and is 4" in height

Each piece is hand cast individually in our Birmingham, UK studio

Other colours are available as well as custom colours by request

name: Bulb - Illuminated Mirror - Oak
description:
This unique illuminated mirror has been hand finished to incorporate the practicality of an everyday mirror and also an LED lit wall light. The mirror gives the illusion of a hanging bulb and when illuminated lights the room with a subtle ambient glow.

Dimensions: 700x700x45mm

Complete with 1 metre power supply + 3 metre power extension cord

Available in Oak Veneer or White

name: Leather Braided Hanging Light
description:
Leather Braided Hanging Light - Single Globe Pendant

This braided single globe pendant is built from cast resin and real leather. Each light is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Each globe measures approx 5 1/2 - 6" in diameter and 5" in height and is cast in a natural off white resin, these are formed individually in a polyhedra shaped mould that is manipulated by hand to give each one it's unique shape. The light's cord is wrapped in braided real leather cord.

It has a total drop of approx 16" in height from the top of the leather portion. Power cord length is 10' (3 metres). The light is fitted with E14 SES or E12 Candelabra light fittings depending on buyers location, appropriate light fittings will be fitted for destination country unless otherwise requested.

Alternative leather colours are available, please select the colour of your choice when ordering.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.

name: Braided Bulb Stem
description:
Single bulb pendant made of solid brass light fitting with braided white leather stem.

Measures 30-36cm tall without bulb. Pendant cord is fabric covered white flex and has a length of 2 metres.

Made to order, ships in 10-14 days.

Bulb not included.

name: Bulb! Illuminated Mirror
description:
This unique illuminated mirror with it's clean simplistic design has been hand finished to incorporate the practicality of an everyday mirror and also an LED lit wall light. The mirror gives the illusion of a hanging bulb and when illuminated lights the room with a subtle ambient glow..

Dimensions: 700x700x45mm

Complete with 1 metre power supply + 3 metre power extension cord

Available in white or Oak veneer

name: Leather Stem - Faceted Globe Pendant Light
description:
This single faceted globe pendant is built from cast resin and real leather. Each light is hand built in our Birmingham, UK studio.

Each globe measures approx 5 1/2 - 6" in diameter and 5" in height and is cast in a natural off white resin, these are formed individually in a polyhedra shaped mould that is manipulated by hand to give each one it's unique shape. The light's cord is wrapped in gold coloured real leather.

The light has a total drop of approx 12" in height from the top of the leather portion to the bottom of the globe. Power cord length is 10' (3 metres). Fitted with E14 SES or E12 Candelabra light fittings depending on buyers location, appropriate light fittings will be fitted for destination country unless otherwise requested.

A selection of leather colours are available.

Made to order, ships in 2-3 weeks.
